article: president george w. bush wants to work with republican sen. john mccain to go to court against political ads by `` shadowy '' outside groups , the white house said thursday amid growing pressure on the president to denounce attacks on democratic challenger john kerry 's war record .
abstract: bush calls mccain about anti-kerry political ads
